00051 struct PxParticleReadDataFlag
00052     {
00053     enum Enum
00054         {
00059             ePOSITION_BUFFER            = (1<<0),
00060 
00065             eVELOCITY_BUFFER            = (1<<1),
00066 
00072             eREST_OFFSET_BUFFER         = (1<<2),
00073 
00078             eFLAGS_BUFFER               = (1<<3),
00079 
00084             eCOLLISION_NORMAL_BUFFER    = (1<<4),
00085 
00090             eDENSITY_BUFFER             = (1<<5),
00091         };
00092     };
00093 
00099 typedef PxFlags<PxParticleReadDataFlag::Enum,PxU16> PxParticleReadDataFlags;
00100 PX_FLAGS_OPERATORS(PxParticleReadDataFlag::Enum,PxU16);
00101 
00107 typedef PxFlags<PxParticleFlag::Enum,PxU16> PxParticleFlags;
00108 PX_FLAGS_OPERATORS(PxParticleFlag::Enum,PxU16);
00109
